articles.title: Two asteroids set to fly past Earth soon, reveals NASA; From size to speed, know all about them - HT Tech
articles.description: Using its advanced tech, NASA says as many as two asteroids may fly past Earth by a close margin tomorrow, March 27. Know their size, speed, distance of approach and other details.
articles.content: In the last few weeks, we've seen asteroids pass by Earth on multiple occasions. Although these space rocks revolve around the Sun in their own orbit, interaction with a planet's gravitational field … [+1870 chars]

articles.title: IIT Madras graduate Pavan Davuluri is new Microsoft Windows boss, VP Rajesh Jha announces in memo - India Today
articles.description: Pavan Davuluri an IIT Madras graduate is the new head of Microsoft Windows and Surface after Panos Panay039s departure to Amazon With this Davuluri joins the league of Indians heading major US tech companies
articles.content: IIT Madras alumni Pavan Davuluri has been appointed as the new head of Microsoft Windows and Surface. Davuluri assumed the role following the departure of Panos Panay, who previously led the departme… [+2651 chars]

articles.title: NFL owners approve ban on swivel hip-drop tackling technique - ESPN
articles.description: NFL owners have approved a rule proposal to ban the swivel hip-drop tackle, the league announced Monday.
articles.content:
Mar 25, 2024, 11:13 AM ET
NFL owners have approved a rule proposal to ban the swivel hip-drop tackle, the league announced Monday.
The violation will result in a 15-yard penalty if flagged in games… [+6608 chars]
